INST1:
You are about to take part in an experiment that involves attending to stimuli on a screen. It will take approximately 14 minutes. You will see letters presented on a screen briefly. Your goal is to respond as quickly as possible using the response option shown at the bottom of the screen after each letter, except if the letter is an 'X'.

DO NOT RESPOND to X stimuli.

Make a response to begin.
INST2: You may now take a short break. Make a response to continue on to the next block. Remember, respond to all stimuli EXCEPT the X.
DEBRIEF: Thank you for participating in the experiment. Make a response to continue.
